featured.text: This is an episode from a 1960 science fiction story.

definition.zh_def: 一集，特定的事件或情節，通常是電視劇或播客中的一部分。
definition.en_def: A part of a series, typically referring to a single installment of a television show or podcast.
definition.example: I can't wait to watch the next episode of my favorite series.
